Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.guidance.TrafficNotification

  • Packages that use TrafficNotification 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.

    • Uses of TrafficNotification in com.here.android.mpa.guidance

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.guidance that return TrafficNotification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TrafficNotification TrafficWarner.getNotificationOnRoute()
      Gets the traffic notification for the route currently in use by NavigationManager.
      static TrafficNotification TrafficWarner.getNotificationOnRoute(Route route)
      Gets the traffic notification for a given Route.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.guidance with parameters of type TrafficNotification 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean TrafficWarner.isAhead(TrafficNotification notification)
      Determines whether or not a traffic notification TrafficNotification is ahead of the last callback position
      boolean TrafficWarner.isOnRoute(Route route, TrafficNotification notification)
      Determines whether or not a traffic notification TrafficNotification is on a given route Route
      abstract void TrafficWarner.Listener.onTraffic(TrafficNotification notification)
      Callback for the traffic warner
      void NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.onTrafficRerouteBegin(TrafficNotification notification)
      Callback that is triggered when traffic-based route re-calculation has begun as a result of of a TrafficNotification.
      void NavigationManager.TrafficRerouteListener.onTrafficRerouteFailed(TrafficNotification notification)
      Callback that is triggered when traffic-based route re-calculation has failed.
